doc.field: Metro Transit Schedule Data - Google Transit Feed Format
Metro Transit Schedule Data - Google Transit Feed Format

The Metro Transit schedule data includes bus and LRT schedules for the Twin Cities metropolitan area. This includes data for all public transit companies in the Minneapolis / St. Paul metropolitan area except the Minnesota Valley Transit Authority. The data uses the Google Transit Feed Specification. This specification can be found at http://code.google.com/transit/spec/transit_feed_specification.html.
This data feed no longer includes data for the Minnesota Valley Transit Authority (MVTA). MVTA data can downloaded here. http://www.datafinder.org/metadata/mvtaschedule.htm
